about_the_game:
Don't forget to wishlist the game!

Story

The kingdom has come under attack by dark forces led by a mysterious villainess. Your father is now elderly and too busy with his case of bad knees. This means that now you, as his heir, will have to take this difficult task into your own hands. Grab your trusted companion - your sword! Free your kingdom, save beautiful girls, and maybe, by freeing all the princesses, you will have a chance to punish the culprit...

Gameplay

Beyond an exciting story, visual novel, and "interaction" with girls, you’ll also have to defend your kingdom through tower defense mechanics. Use your strategic skills, place towers, and improve their strength, while using unique abilities from rescued princesses.

Features

  • 25 high-quality H-scenes that are animated using Live2d.

  • Scenes voiced by professional VAs.

  • 6 beautiful and captivated heroines who are ready to keep you company, when, of course, you save them.

  • One villainess who just wants to prevent you from freeing your kingdom.

  • A map with many tower defense levels, as well as various biomes and more.

  • A fascinating story about a duty to the kingdom... or... the lust of the main character?

  • Gameplay that allows you to play with one hand - with the incredible efforts of the programmer and artist, the player will get an experience of a game that can be played using only one hand.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Content in this game may not be appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. 
- Horny Kingdom includes depictions of masturbation, big breasts, and sexual poses. 
- All characters included in the game are over the age of 18, and all sexual acts in the game are consensual.
- This game includes mentions and use of alcohol.

name: Horny Kingdom: Cum Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Horny Kingdom is a visual novel with tower defense elements. Free your kingdom from goblin armies, save the most beautiful princesses and they won't remain in your debt, helping you not only in battle but also bringing the lewdest fantasies to life!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
